name: MEMBERS ASSOCIATION FOR SOCIAL SERVICE

address: A. Venkatesh Naik Colony, Po: Nagoli

briefDescription: The MEMBERS ASSOCIATION FOR SOCIAL SERVICE is a non-political, non-profit, organization working for promotion and development of rural poor people, to liberate unorganized into organized, develop weaker section of the society. Improve socio-economic condition of the rural community.  Encourage small savings among women and empower them economically. Educate them in child care, malnutrition, family planning, sanitation, hygiene & rural technology. Promote soil and water conservation. Promotion of science, literature and arts giving training about computer & other technical implements & to stop child labour and giving them education organize deprived community in to local community & generate employment activities and develop rural industries
